p:
Galv√£o et al. (
30 ) reported a US$ 13.21/kg specific cost when evaluating the supercritical technology (CO 2 solvent) costs for flaxseed oil extraction, whereas linseed oil obtained by cold mechanical pressing is marketed at US$ 54.00/kg in Brazil (
31 ). These costs when compared to those for propane extraction make it a non-market-competitive technology. However, industrial-scale propane extraction (increased capacity) could reduce subcritical extraction costs, making it an attractive method.
